      • isRaceProgram

        public static boolean isRaceProgram(@NonNull
                                    nz.co.pltech.arda.program.api.TrainingGoal trainingGoal)
        Checks if a program has a race goal (e.g. 5K, 10K) rather than a maintenance or fitness goal. This can be used for both running and cycling programs.
        Parameters:
        trainingGoal - Training goal to check against.
        Returns:
        True if the goal is a race, false otherwise.

                                              nz.co.pltech.arda.program.api.ActiveProgram activeProgram)
        Checks if the last active workout (i.e. non-rest day) of a program was completed successfully.
        Parameters:
        context - Context instance.
        activeProgram - The active program.
        Returns:
        True if the last workout was completed, false otherwise.
